alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cheyenne, northwestern Thomas, southwestern Rawlins and central Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas through 130 AM MDT/230 AM CDT/... At 1254 AM MDT/154 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McDonald to 6 miles north of Ruleton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... McDonald around 200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Goodland. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 9 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
